info.description: This is the API documentation for the Lynx Check-in system.
info.title: Lynx API

post.description:
Endpoint to create a new account. An account is the entity that owns every resource in the system for a given client.
An account may have multiple users, but only one account can be created per client.

delete.description: Endpoint to delete an account and all its related data

patch.description: Endpoint to update the details of an account.

get.description: Endpoint to list the authority connections for the account. An authority connection are the credentials used to connect to an authority (e.g. SES.hospedajes, Mossos d'esquadra, Ertzaintza, etc.)

parameters.description: Next token to retrieve the next page
parameters.name: next

post.description: Endpoint to create a new authority connection for an account. An authority connection are the credentials used to connect to an authority (e.g. SES.hospedajes, Mossos d'esquadra, Ertzaintza, etc.)
Endpoint to validate the credentials of an authority connection. This checks if the provided credentials are valid for the specified authority.

get.description: Endpoint to get a specific authority connection from an account. An authority connection are the credentials used to connect to an authority (e.g. SES.hospedajes, Mossos d'esquadra, Ertzaintza, etc.)

delete.description: Endpoint to delete an authority connection from an account. An authority connection are the credentials used to connect to an authority (e.g. SES.hospedajes, Mossos d'esquadra, Ertzaintza, etc.)

patch.description: Endpoint to update the details of an authority connection from an account. An authority connection are the credentials used to connect to an authority (e.g. SES.hospedajes, Mossos d'esquadra, Ertzaintza, etc.)

get.description: Endpoint to list the lodgings of an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

parameters.description: Filter lodgings by number of rooms
parameters.name: numRooms

parameters.description: Filter lodgings by authority connection ID
parameters.name: authConnID

parameters.description: Filter lodgings created from this date
parameters.name: createdFrom

parameters.description: Filter lodgings created to this date
parameters.name: createdTo

post.description: Endpoint to create a new lodging unit for an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

get.description: Endpoint to get a specific lodging unit from an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

delete.description: Endpoint to delete a specific lodging unit from an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

patch.description: Endpoint to update the details of a lodging unit from an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

get.description: Endpoint to list reports for an account, or a specific lodging if provided.

x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodCard: Payment by credit or debit card
x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodDestination: Payment upon arrival at the lodging

post.description: Endpoint to create a complete traveler report with contract and traveler sections.

Endpoint to check a report for potential issues, typos, and conflicts before creating it.
If reportId is provided, it will avoid conflicts with itself.
post.summary: Check report potential issues, typos, and conflicts

post.description: Endpoint to create the contract for a report. This also creates the base report itself.

get.description: Endpoint to get a report with travelers by ID.
get.summary: Get report with travelers by ID

parameters.description: Include additional data in the response (e.g., lodging details)
parameters.name: include

patch.description: Endpoint to update the contract section of a report.

post.description:
Endpoint to check a report for potential issues, typos, and conflicts before creating it.
If reportId is provided, it will avoid conflicts with itself.
post.summary: Check report potential issues, typos, and conflicts

get.description: Endpoint to get a report by ID.
List all lodging tokens for the given lodging

post.description: Create a new lodging token for public report creation for the given lodging

delete.description: Revoke a lodging token for the given lodging. This will invalidate the token and prevent further use.

post.description: Endpoint to onboard an account. This will set the account's onboarded flag to true.

get.description: Endpoint to list reports for an account, or a specific lodging if provided.

x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodCard: Payment by credit or debit card
x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodDestination: Payment upon arrival at the lodging

get.description: Retrieves the current subscription status and details for the account

delete.description: Cancels the user's subscription at the end of the current billing period

post.description: Creates a Stripe checkout session for the user to purchase a subscription

get.description: Endpoint to get the public data of a specific lodging unit from an account. A lodging unit is any accommodation facility, such as a hotel, rental apartment, etc.

post.description: Endpoint to create a complete traveler report with contract and traveler sections as a guest (traveler typically).
Endpoint to check a report for potential issues, typos, and conflicts before creating it as a guest (traveler typically). If reportId is provided, it will avoid conflicts with itself.
post.summary: Check report potential issues, typos, and conflicts as a guest

post.description: Endpoint to check a report for potential issues, typos, and conflicts before creating it as a guest (traveler typically). If reportId is provided, it will avoid conflicts with itself.
post.summary: Check report potential issues, typos, and conflicts as a guest

get.description: Endpoint to get global statistics for total travelers and reports.

post.description: Validate a lodging token for the given lodging. This will check if the token is valid and active.
Processes Stripe webhook events for subscription management

postalCode.description: TODO: validate:"postcode_iso3166_alpha3" alpha3 not supported in go-playground validator

kinship.description: (temporarily optional due to SES.hospedajes' technical issues)

authConn.description: Optional, can be nil if not included

signature.description: S3 URL to handwritten signature SVG

cardExpirationDate.description: (optional) Card Expiration Date, if card used [caducidadTarjeta] (MM/AAAA)

x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodCard: Payment by credit or debit card
x-enum-comments.PaymentMethodDestination: Payment upon arrival at the lodging

x-enum-comments.ReportStatusCompleted: All information collected but not yet sent
x-enum-comments.ReportStatusPendingHosting: Report created but not yet filled by lodging manager
x-enum-comments.ReportStatusPendingTraveler: Report created but not yet filled by travelers

LodgingToken.description:
Lodging token for authentication
Use this token to authenticate requests to public endpoints related to a specific lodging. This token is required for report creation and basic lodging information retrieval as a traveler.
LodgingToken.name: X-Lodging-Token

OAuth2AccessCode.description: OAuth2 authentication handled by Amazon Cognito for the Lynx Check-in signed-up users. This is mainly used for manager-related endpoints.

scopes.openid: Grants access to the base endpoints (least privileged scope)
